title: Eastern breeze
ingredients: seeds from 1 pomegranate (about 1 heaped tsp per glass)
instructions: Fill six highball or big wine glasses with ice and divide 300ml vodka between them. Add 24 mint leaves, seeds from 1 pomegranate (about 1 heaped tsp per glass) and 600ml apple juice, then stir with a straw or chopstick to muddle.
